text:
Venmo - New York, NY - Full Time

Venmo (https://venmo.com) is the leading way to make and share payments. We have an openings for an Android engineer, iOS engineer, backend engineers, and in our devops team. We offer competitive salaries, terrific benefits, and the chance to change the way the world interacts with money.

To apply, email me personally at ron+dec13@venmo.com (-Ron, Android Engineer)
